about_the_game:
Re-live the atmosphere and emotion of Anamorphine over and over again with the Anamorphine Soundtrack, featuring 8 original compositions by Beatrix Moersch, arranged and fully re-mastered for the linear format.

Track list:
1. A Serenade to Memories (4:59)
2. First Snowfall (5:26)
3. Release (3:39)
4. Escape (3:13)
5. I Had A Sad Dream (6:10)
6. Fragments (4:08)
7. Dark Circles (4:10)
8. Washing Over Me (5:57)

Format: 320kpb mp3

name: Anamorphine Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Not needed
  • Storage: 191.6 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Whatever you've got!
  • Additional Notes: It's a soundtrack!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Not needed

  • Sound Card: The best you've got!
  • Additional Notes: It's a soundtrack!

short_description: Listen to the soundtrack from Anamorphine, the introspective adventure game.
supported_languages:
English*, French
